============================
The cli of Serverless Cloud Function
============================
This is a local tools for SCF.
Quick Start
-----------
First, install the library:

.. code-block:: sh

    $ pip install tcf

or download source code from github and install:

.. code-block:: sh

    $ git clone https://github.com/tencentyun/tcfcli.git
    $ cd tcfcli
    $ python setup.py -e .
